member.name: T:Microsoft.Testing.Extensions.TrxReport.Abstractions.ITrxReportCapability
member.summary: This capability is used to indicate whether or not the test framework supports trx report generation. By supporting trx generation, the test adapter should ensure that some required properties are available for all the nodes. We expect these properties in the node bag: - 1 trxreport.classname - 0..n trxreport.testcategory And, in case of exception, the following extra properties: - trxreport.exceptionmessage - trxreport.exceptionstacktrace.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Testing.Extensions.TrxReport.Abstractions.ITrxReportCapability.IsSupported
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether indicates if the test framework supports trx report properties enrichment.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Testing.Extensions.TrxReport.Abstractions.ITrxReportCapability.Enable
member.summary: Notifies the test framework that the trx report is enabled and trx report properties should be added to the test nodes.

member.summary: Asynchronously extracts all the files in the specified archive to a directory on the file system.
member.param: The path to the archive to extract.
The path to the directory in which to place the extracted files.
The token to monitor for cancellation requests.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous extract operation.

member.name: M:Polyfills.Polyfill.<G>$4E14A39FD01773A148FA55FFD9F99471.ExtractToDirectoryAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously extracts all the files in the specified archive to a directory on the file system.
member.param: The path to the archive to extract.
The path to the directory in which to place the extracted files.
true to overwrite existing files; false otherwise.
The token to monitor for cancellation requests.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous extract operation.

member.name: M:Polyfills.Polyfill.<G>$4E14A39FD01773A148FA55FFD9F99471.ExtractToDirectoryAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Text.Encoding,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously extracts all the files in the specified archive to a directory on the file system and uses the specified character encoding for entry names.
member.param: The path to the archive to extract.
The path to the directory in which to place the extracted files.
The encoding to use when reading entry names in this archive.
The token to monitor for cancellation requests.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous extract operation.

member.name: M:Polyfills.Polyfill.<G>$4E14A39FD01773A148FA55FFD9F99471.ExtractToDirectoryAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Text.Encoding,System.Boolean,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously extracts all the files in the specified archive to a directory on the file system and uses the specified character encoding for entry names.
member.param: The path to the archive to extract.
The path to the directory in which to place the extracted files.
The encoding to use when reading entry names in this archive.
true to overwrite existing files; false otherwise.
The token to monitor for cancellation requests.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous extract operation.

member.summary: Asynchronously creates a zip archive that contains the files and directories from the specified directory.

member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous create operation.

member.name: M:Polyfills.Polyfill.<G>$4E14A39FD01773A148FA55FFD9F99471.CreateFromDirectoryAsync(System.String,System.String,System.IO.Compression.CompressionLevel,System.Boolean,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously creates a zip archive that contains the files and directories from the specified directory and uses the specified compression level.
member.param: The path to the directory to archive.
The path of the archive to create.
The compression level to use.
true to include the directory name from sourceDirectoryName at the root of the archive; false otherwise.
The token to monitor for cancellation requests.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous create operation.

member.name: M:Polyfills.Polyfill.<G>$4E14A39FD01773A148FA55FFD9F99471.CreateFromDirectoryAsync(System.String,System.String,System.IO.Compression.CompressionLevel,System.Boolean,System.Text.Encoding,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously creates a zip archive that contains the files and directories from the specified directory, uses the specified compression level and character encoding for entry names.
member.param: The path to the directory to archive.
The path of the archive to create.
The compression level to use.
true to include the directory name from sourceDirectoryName at the root of the archive; false otherwise.
The encoding to use when reading or writing entry names in this archive.
The token to monitor for cancellation requests.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous create operation.
